issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Frequently getting the 403 Aw Shucks page when trying to manage my apps at https://my.appcelerator.com/apps  
Seems to happen most often when the page has not finished fully loading and I click on a link.  Can also happen if I hit refresh before the page is done loading.
I can temporarily work around it by clearing cookies, waiting a few minutes, then logging back in. However it is difficult to get more than a few minutes in before getting the error.
fields.summary: Frequently getting the 403 Aw Shucks page when trying to manage my apps

comments.body:
Hello,

Which OS are you using? Does this happen in other browser? 

Best,

Mauro

Windows 7 - 64.
Also see the problem with Chrome 29.0.1547.65 on OSX 10.7.5 

I tried to replicate in IE-10 on Win7-64 but was not able to.
Tried with Chrome in Win 7, it's working. Looks like a temporal network hiccup.
